column1: If applicable, start R-18 manually or using the R-18 hand-held re-
Starting engine using the hand-held remote:

column2:
Turn ignition switch to ON position,
if applicable.

On the hand-held, set
the PUMP switch to START.
Press and release the action/deadman switch.

Repeat
for each pumping unit required.
Throttling of the engine from idle to run and back to idle will
be done automatically based on fuel demand providing com-
munication systems and PLC's are operational.
